name: Block Blast (Beta)
description:
Uh this is the beta for my bullet hell puzzle game.

I was too lazy to put the controls in the game:

WASD to move

QE to rotate

SPACE to place

for P2 it is arrows to move, <> to rotate and M to place. [hella jank]

The game is kinda easy on default settings. Tweak the CPU difficulty to your liking in the OPTIONS area. I recommend a lv4 CPU and at least 5 block types

you can pretty much figure out the rest.

Please comment any bugs or suggestions please :)
